mapper.select: SELECT cu.charge_day, cu.station_name, cu.charge_time, cu.charge_amount, cu.payment_amount, cu.payment_point, cu.transaction_id, cu.refunded FROM card_usehistory cu JOIN membership mc on cu.mcard_num = mc.card_num where cu.mcard_num = #{card_num};
SELECT card_point, used_point, point_day FROM point_history where card_num = #{card_num};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card_usehistory (charge_time, charge_amount, station_name, payment_amount, payment_point, charge_day, mcard_num, es_statNm) VALUES (#{chargingTime}, #{chargingAmount}, #{statId}, #{chargeAmountInput}, #{pointInput}, NOW(), #{cardNum}, #{es_statNm})
